fn.p: Abbreviations: BP = blood pressure, ELISA = enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay, Hb = hemoglobin, HD = hemodialysis, IFA = immunofluorescence assay, MERS-CoV = middle east respiratory syndrome coronavirus, ppNT = pseudoparticle neutralization assay.

How to cite this article: Park HC, Lee SH, Kim J, Kim DH, Cho A, Jeon HJ, Oh J, Noh JW, Jeong DW, Kim YG, Lee CH, Yoo KD, Lee YK. Effect of isolation practice on the transmission of middle east respiratory syndrome coronavirus among hemodialysis patients: A 2-year prospective cohort study. Medicine. 2020;99:3(e18782).
